TopicTitle: How to make a flight plan picture like this one?

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I saw a flight plan made by xchoo in this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/16349-Stock-0-16-NASA-Space-Shuttle-Buran-hybrid

Here is direct link to the picture: http://i.imgur.com/E83sI.jpg

Does anyone know how to make such kind of images easily? Evident answer is Photoshop but I am very bad at it so tips, icon packs, background images and any other possible kind of help are very welcome

It is a little bit off-topic but it seems to me this picture can be used for in-game flight planner. Imagine: you left-click on the trajectory and select an action - turn on ASAS, decouple boosters, set thrust to 70%, etc. Just like with maneuver nodes.

take an series of pictures during launch, pad, booster separation, main stage separation You will probably want to do an night launch as you can then remove the black easy.

Now take an picture or Kerbin from orbit. Reduce size of the launch pictures and add.
